channel.title: CVE Feed for SonicWall -- Email Security Virtual Appliance
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SonicWall -- Email Security Virtual Appliance

item.title: CVE-2021-20025|2024-08-03T17:30:07.435Z -- sonicwall -- email%20security%20virtual%20appliance
item.description: SonicWall Email Security Virtual Appliance version 10.0.9 and earlier versions contain a default username and a password that is used at initial setup. An attacker could exploit this transitional/temporary user account from the trusted domain to access the Virtual Appliance remotely only when the device is freshly installed and not connected to Mysonicwall.
